title: Congress, RJD claim Modi govt's fresh lateral entry push ‘attack on reservation’:
selftext: Modi govt's fresh push to lateral entry: UPSC advertises 45 posts of JS, Directors across ministries. Opposition slams Lateral Entry as an attack on reservation.
comments: Lets finish the IAS system entirely.
